SEARCH
Module overrungl.opengl
Package overrungl.opengl

Class GL10C

java.lang.Object
overrungl.opengl.GL10C
Direct Known Subclasses:
GL10, GL11C
public sealed class GL10C extends Object permits GL10, GL11C
GL10C relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • GL10C refers to one or more preview APIs: MemorySegment, SegmentAllocator.
Programs can only use GL10C when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
The OpenGL 1.0 forward compatible functions.
Since:
0.1.0
Author:
squid233
